skills.name: TRIGGERED
desc: • Deals 4 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 25% Chance to instantly Trigger all Bomb effects on the target.

skills.name: TIME BOMB
desc: • Places a Time Bomb on the target for 2 turns.
• Time Bomb deals true damage and Stuns the target for 1 turn when their timer reaches zero. Time Bomb damage scales based on your ATK, your MAGIC, and the enemy’s MAX HP.
